body:
Was an amazing 5 years, thank you everybody whom was staff and whom I spoke to during this time. Good luck to everyone in life, deuces.

**PS** Apollo never won a tournament with real competition!
**P.P.S** Austin Louis Mayes is built like the ugandan knuckles.
LFT <3

title: GOODBYE BOYS & GIRLS.
